directions: Beat eggs with salt, pepper and water. Heat butter in a pan over high heat until frothing. Pour in egg mix. Turn down heat slightly. Gently push cooked egg to the middle of pan with a wooden fork, allowing uncooked egg to run underneath.
When omelette is set on top - and browned underneath, spread with Maille(R) Old Style mustard, sour cream and sprinkle with chopped ham. Flip omelette over and slide onto a serving plate.
Best served with tomato salad, tossed in vinaigrette with basil leaves.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Ham Omelette with Maille® Old Style Mustard
